sentence: 22-year-old  Alon  was  one  of  about  240  hostages  seized  by  Hamas  on  Oct.  7  as  part  of  its  attack  on  Israel,  which  killed  around  1,200  people,  according  to  Israeli  officials.
Hamas  militants  killed  hundreds  at  the  festival.
According  to  Gaza's  Health  Ministry,  more  than  26,000  Palestinians  have  been  killed  since  Israel's  military  campaign  began  in  October.
